settings.caption: compact design
settings.heading: Compact Walk-Behind Floor Scrubber
settings.text: Discover unparalleled cleaning capabilities with the Scrubo Pristine 16. Engineered for efficiency, its compact design and 16-inch cleaning path reach challenging spots effortlessly. The adjustable handle enhances comfort, ensuring a personalized experience. Boasting a robust 400W brush motor, it powers through dirt with ease, while the impressive 3-4 hours of work time guarantees completion of any task with finesse.

settings.caption: Touchscreen display
settings.heading: Easy To Operate
settings.text: Introducing a cutting-edge design with a touchscreen panel that displays vital information at your fingertips. Keep track of the battery life with a convenient gauge, ensuring you're always aware of the remaining power. Adjust the brush motor with three distinct power levels for optimal cleaning. Effortlessly control the brush and vacuum functions with dedicated buttons, and easily manage the spraying of solution liquid with a simple toggle button. Experience ultimate convenience and control in one innovative panel.
